name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior EMC Engineer, I possess extensive experience in **system design**, **requirements management**, and ensuring **EMC compliance** with a deep understanding of **Electromagnetic Environment** and **EMC Defence Standards**. My proven ability to establish rigorous **testing regimes** ensures that all engineering solutions meet necessary standards and regulations while providing essential **engineering support** for cross-functional teams.

With 8 years as a Full Stack Developer, I bring unique strengths in leveraging my technical skills in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** to build high-performance applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors. I have expertise in modern frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and **Node.js**, alongside backend technologies like **FastAPI** and **Django**. My cloud experience extends across **Azure** and **AWS**, which has been instrumental in leading the development of enterprise-grade platforms that integrate AI/ML capabilities. I have also implemented **CI/CD automation** and designed applications aligned with compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Additionally, I have hands-on experience with building **machine learning pipelines**, serving ML models in production, and implementing **MLOps workflows** using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
